name: Corporate Shuffle
description:
How do you get ahead in your career when your coworkers keep taking credit for your work? Welcome to the Corporate Shuffle!

The concept is simple: collect as many expense reports and get them to your boss's office before your coworkers see you. But be careful! If your boss doesn't get the reports, you'll be broke and unemployed!

Intuitive swipe controls make the game both fun and challenging.
